麻.definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc; hemp or flax fiber for textile materials; sesame; CL:縷|缕[lu:3]; (of materials) rough or coarse; pocked; pitted; to have pins and needles or tingling; to feel numb

麻力.definition: swift; agile; efficient; quick witted (colloquial); also written 麻利[ma2 li5]

麻吉.definition: (slang) (Tw) close friend; best pal; to get along well; to be tight; congenial

麻城.definition: Macheng, county-level city in Huanggang 黃岡|黄冈[Huang2 gang1], Hubei

麻城市.definition: Macheng, county-level city in Huanggang 黃岡|黄冈[Huang2 gang1], Hubei

麻婆豆腐.definition: mapo tofu; stir-fried beancurd in chili sauce

麻山.definition: Mashan district of Jixi city 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang

麻山區.definition: Mashan district of Jixi city 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang

麻栗坡.definition: Malipo county in Wenshan Zhuang and Miao autonomous prefecture 文山壯族苗族自治州|文山壮族苗族自治州[Wen2 shan1 Zhuang4 zu2 Miao2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan

麻栗坡縣.definition: Malipo county in Wenshan Zhuang and Miao autonomous prefecture 文山壯族苗族自治州|文山壮族苗族自治州[Wen2 shan1 Zhuang4 zu2 Miao2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan

麻椒.definition: an extra strong type of Sichuan pepper, dark green when ripe but light brown after air drying

麻江.definition: Majiang county in Qiandongnan Miao and Dong autonomous prefecture 黔東南州|黔东南州[Qian2 dong1 nan2 zhou1], Guizhou

麻江縣.definition: Majiang county in Qiandongnan Miao and Dong autonomous prefecture 黔東南州|黔东南州[Qian2 dong1 nan2 zhou1], Guizhou

麻煩.definition: trouble; inconvenience; inconvenient; troublesome; annoying; to bother sb; to put sb to trouble

麻生.definition: Asō (name); ASŌ Tarō (1940-), Japanese entrepreneur and LDP politician, prime minister 2008-2009

麻生太郎.definition: ASŌ Tarō (1940-), Japanese entrepreneur and LDP politician, prime minister from 2008

麻痺.definition: paralysis; palsy; numbness; to benumb; (fig.) to lull; negligent; apathetic

麻瘋.definition: leprosy; also written 麻風|麻风

麻省理工學院.pinyin: Ma2 sheng3 Li3 gong1 Xue2 yuan4

麻章.definition: Mazhang District of Zhanjiang City 湛江市[Zhan4 jiang1 Shi4], Guangdong

麻章區.definition: Mazhang District of Zhanjiang City 湛江市[Zhan4 jiang1 Shi4], Guangdong

麻糬.definition: (transliteration of Japanese "mochi") sticky rice balls; mochi

麻腮風.definition: measles, mumps and rubella (MMR) (abbr. for 麻疹[ma2 zhen3] + 流行性腮腺炎[liu2 xing2 xing4 sai1 xian4 yan2] + 風疹|风疹[feng1 zhen3])

麻花.definition: fried dough twist (crisp snack food made by deep-frying plaited dough); worn out or worn smooth (of clothes)

麻辣燙.definition: hot spicy soup (often sold at street stalls)

麻醉.definition: anesthesia; to anesthetize; (fig.) to corrupt (sb's mind); to enervate; to numb the mind (to escape from harsh reality)

麻陽.definition: Mayang Miao autonomous county in Huaihua 懷化|怀化[Huai2 hua4], Hunan

麻陽縣.definition: Mayang Miao autonomous county in Huaihua 懷化|怀化[Huai2 hua4], Hunan

麻陽苗族自治縣.pinyin: Ma2 yang2 Miao2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4
麻陽苗族自治縣.definition: Mayang Miao autonomous county in Huaihua 懷化|怀化[Huai2 hua4], Hunan

麻雀雖小，五臟俱全.pinyin: ma2 que4 sui1 xiao3 , wu3 zang4 ju4 quan2
麻雀雖小，五臟俱全.definition: the sparrow may be small but all its vital organs are there (idiom); small but complete in every detail

麻類.definition: bast fiber plant (general term for hemp, flax, jute, ramie etc)

麻麻亮.definition: (dialect) to begin to dawn; to be just getting light
